Property.name: forId
Property.comment: The id of the input element to which this label will be bound via the standard 'htmlFor' attribute. If not specified, the attribute will not be added to the label.

Property.name: html
Property.comment: An HTML fragment that will be used as the label's innerHTML (defaults to ''). Note that if {@link #text} is specified it will take precedence and this value will be ignored.

Property.name: text
Property.comment: The plain text to display within the label (defaults to ''). If you need to include HTML tags within the label's innerHTML, use the {@link #html} config instead.
